name: Hard Time Prison Break Fighting 3D
description:
Welcome to the cruelest and horrific prison in the world! The most famous robbers, murderers, gangsters and other criminal persons are lockdown here. The peaceful days here have ended – and revolt has started! There is only one way – to show who is the best fighter here and stop these rebelling criminals! Only the strongest one would escape the prison!

Unleash your rage and beat all of these robbers, murderers, gangsters as one of them! Choose your favorite offender and use all your skills to beat the crap out of other criminals! These criminal scum use different fighting styles – karate, Taekwondo, boxing or even Kung Fu - and each fighter has a unique special attack! Earn points for beaten opponents to buy and unlock new punches, kicks, and strikes!

Overcome every enemy on your way – be it prisoners or security guards - and show them, who is the strongest warrior here! They should respect your authority – or they would die! Join the revolt and escape the prison playing Hard Time Prison Break Fighting 3D!

Hard Time Prison Break Fighting 3D Features:
Ultimate fighting action game about robbers, murderers, gangsters
Realistic jail backgrounds – prison canteen, gym, yard
Varies fighting styles and unique special attack for each fighter
Many punches and strikes to unlock

Let crime bosses face each other in this ultimate fighting game — Hard Time Prison Break Fighting 3D!
